1 + 3x + 7y + 10xy
00: 1 + 0 + 0 + 0 = 1
01: 1 + 0 + 7 + 0 = 8
10: 1 + 3 + 0 + 0 = 4
11: 1 + 3 + 7 + 10 = 21

C_1= 34

g_1 = (1 + 3x + 7*0 + 10*x*0) + (1 + 3x + 7*1 + 10*x*1) = (1 + 3x) + (8 + 13x)  = 9 + 16x
g_2 = (1 + 3*9256297558679035993185603119224026483248878132105160101344427504900917382708 + 7*y + 10 * 9256297558679035993185603119224026483248878132105160101344427504900917382708 * y) +

5880649804197832757310403612414804361198269995899445960335078328126943652508 + 5010004099433259042870408211211164478295323719387463638651458302705939844619y
